def_cn: （婚姻、关系或联系的）破裂，终结
def_en: The break-up of a marriage, relationship, or association is the act of it finishing or coming to an end because the people involved decide that it is not working successfully.

def_cn: （组织或国家的）分裂，解体
def_en: The break-up of an organization or a country is the act of it separating or dividing into several parts.
